caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 7.
Pachyiulus flavipes
, distribution in Cyprus.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Taxonomic remarks. It has recently been revived from synonymy with
P. vari us
(Fabricius, 1781 ) with which it shares virtually the same gonopod structure, but is molecularly well differentiated and can also be distinguished by its specific colouration (
Frederiksen et al. , 2012
).
